item.title: Kayleen add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "To love another person is to see the face of God." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Kayleen add a quote by Stephanie Pearl-McPhee
item.description: "100 years ago, buying something you could make was considered wasteful; now making something you could buy is considered wasteful. I am not convinced this is a step in the right direction." -- Stephanie Pearl-McPhee

item.title: Kayleen add a quote by Alexandre Dumas
item.description: "...but my friends call me Edmund Dantes." -- Alexandre Dumas

item.title: Kayleen add a quote by Victor hugo
item.description: "Music expresses that which cannot be put into words and that which cannot remain silent" -- Victor hugo

item.title: Kayleen add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Forget not, never forget that you have promised me to use this silver to become an honest man.... Jean Valjean, my brother: you belong no longer to evil, but to good. It is your soul that I am buying for you. I withdraw it from dark thoughts and from the spirit of perdition, and I give it to God!" -- Victor Hugo
